category.template: I'll fetch the available courses for you. Which department or year are you interested in? (CSE, IT, ECE, MECH, CIVIL)
Let me get the details for that course. Can you specify the course code or full name?
I'll help you with the syllabus. Which semester and subject are you asking about?
I can check the credits for that course. Please provide the course code or subject name.
Let me check your exam schedule. Which subject or semester exams are you asking about?
I'll show you the exam schedule. Would you like to see: Mid-term exams, End-semester exams, or Re-exams?
Checking exam dates... Which subject's exam date do you need?
To check exam results, I need your enrollment number and semester. Have these ready?
You can check results through: 1) Student Portal (results.college.edu), 2) Ask me with your enrollment number, or 3) Visit the exam cell. Which method do you prefer?
Let me show your pending assignments. Which subject or all subjects?
I'll check assignment deadlines. Which subject assignment are you asking about?
To submit assignments, go to: portal.college.edu/assignments or email your faculty. Need the faculty email?
Which subject's assignment topics do you need? I can provide guidelines and resources.
Library Hours: Monday-Friday: 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM, Saturday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Sunday: Closed. During exams, extended hours till 10:00 PM!
The library is open: Weekdays 8 AM - 8 PM, Saturdays 9 AM - 5 PM. Extended hours during exam weeks! Need directions to the library?
I can help you search for books. What's the book title or author you're looking for?
To issue a book: 1) Search in library catalog, 2) Note the book location, 3) Present your student ID at counter. You can issue up to 3 books for 15 days!
Library Rules: Max 3 books for 15 days, Student ID required, Maintain silence, Phones on silent, Fine: Rs.5/day for late returns. Need more info?
I can show you placement statistics and visiting companies. Which year's data: 2023, 2024, or upcoming drives?
Recent placement highlights: Avg Package: 6.5 LPA, Highest: 24 LPA, Top recruiters: TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Cognizant. Want company-specific details?
Placement registration: 1) Maintain 60%+ aggregate, 2) No active backlogs, 3) Register on placement portal, 4) Upload resume. Need the portal link?
Let me check the latest placement drive schedule. Would you like to see: This month's drives, Next month, or All upcoming?
Resume Building Tips: Keep it 1-page, Highlight projects and skills, Add internships, Include certifications, Proofread carefully! Want me to share a template?
I can suggest project ideas! Which domain: AI/ML, Web Development, Mobile Apps, Cybersecurity, or Game Development?
For final year projects: Choose trending tech, solve real problems, consult faculty early, form team wisely. Need domain-specific suggestions?
Let me check project deadlines. Which semester and type: Minor project or Major project?
Hostel Info: Boys: 3 blocks, Girls: 2 blocks. Mess timings: Breakfast 7-9 AM, Lunch 12-2 PM, Dinner 7-9 PM. Need specific block details?
Canteen operates 8 AM - 8 PM. Menu highlights: Breakfast ₹30-50, Lunch ₹50-80, Snacks ₹20-40. Daily special available! Want today's menu?
College bus routes available from major areas. Morning: 7:00, 7:30, 8:00 AM. Evening: 4:30, 5:30, 6:30 PM. Which route do you need?
Gym Facility: Location: Sports Complex, Timing: 6 AM - 9 PM, Student membership: Rs.500/semester. Includes cardio and weights!
To provide fee details, I need: Which program (B.Tech/M.Tech/MBA) and year? Fees vary by course and category.
Fee Payment options: Online: portal.college.edu/fees, Bank: Pay at campus branch, UPI: Available. Deadline: 10th of each semester start month.
To check attendance: Login to student portal → Academics → Attendance. Minimum required: 75%. Want help with portal access?
If attendance is below 75%: Submit medical certificate or genuine reason to HOD within 3 days. Need the application format?
Certificates available: Bonafide, Character Certificate, Course Completion. Apply at: Admin Office or online portal. Processing: 3-5 working days.
For lost ID card: 1) Report to admin immediately, 2) File written application, 3) Pay Rs.200 duplicate fee, 4) Collect in 7 days. Need the application format?
Leave application: Get parent/guardian approval → Fill form (available at office) → Submit to class teacher → Copy to HOD. Medical leaves need doctor's certificate.
Internship info: Check Training and Placement portal, Summer internships mandatory in 3rd year, Stipend ranges: Rs.5k-25k/month. Need company list?
After internship: Submit completion certificate and report to Training and Placement office within 15 days of semester start. Format available on portal.
Which faculty member do you need to contact? Provide department or faculty name, I'll share their email and cabin number.
Which department's HOD? I can provide their contact details and visiting hours for student queries.
Principal's Office: Location: Admin Block 1st Floor, Contact: 0120-1234567, Visiting Hours: 10 AM - 1 PM (Mon-Fri). Appointment recommended!
Emergency Contacts: Security: 0120-1234568, Medical: 0120-1234569, Maintenance: 0120-1234570. Available 24/7!
Medical Room: Ground Floor Admin Block, Doctor: 9 AM - 5 PM (Mon-Sat), Ambulance: Available for emergencies, Call: 0120-1234569
Upcoming events: Check notice board or student portal. Major annual events: Tech Fest (Sept), Cultural Fest (Feb), Sports Day (Nov). Want event details?
Student Clubs: Coding Club, Drama Society, Music Club, Photography, Robotics. Registration: First week of semester. Which interests you?
Sports: Cricket ground, Football field, Basketball court, Badminton (4 courts), Table Tennis. Equipment available at Sports Complex!
Academic Calendar: Odd Sem: July-Dec, Even Sem: Jan-June. Mid-terms: 8th week, End-semester: 15th-16th week. Want detailed calendar PDF?
Backlog exams held before regular exams. Registration: Via student portal, Fee: Rs.500/subject, Apply 30 days before exam. Need registration help?
Grading: O (90-100), A+ (80-89), A (70-79), B+ (60-69), B (50-59), C (40-49), F (below 40). GPA calculated on 10-point scale. Clear?
Passing criteria: 40% in each subject, 45% aggregate per semester. Both internal (30%) and external (70%) exams required to pass.
